titleStmt.title: The seamens case with respest [sic] to their service in the navy wherein divers hardships which they undergo are truly stated, and humbly presented to his Majesty and both houses of Parliament. By John Dennis, Philo Patriæ.
titleStmt.author: Dennis, John, 1657-1734.
